STM: Struggling with intro to Comp Sci, coding for assignments feels overwhelming.
MTM: Transitioning from high school to college life, facing the realities of coursework and social interactions.
LTM: Recently started college, aiming to build foundational skills in blockchain and Web3 technologies.

short_term.goal: Improve coding skills by joining a coding club or hackathon
Seek out internship opportunities in blockchain and tech companies

long_term: Develop expertise in blockchain technology and Web3 applications.

plot_points.description: Navigating the steep learning curve of college-level computer science courses.

STM: Made friends in class, but feeling disconnected from high school friends.
Social events in dorms seem overwhelming; prefers to skip them.
MTM: Exploring NYC, meeting diverse people, but also experiencing the isolation of college life.
LTM: Exploring personal identity, independence, and forming initial relationships.

short_term.goal: Join a local community group or club to meet like-minded individuals
Initiate regular hangouts or events with new friends

long_term: Develop a strong network of friends and professional contacts.

plot_points.description: Struggling with the balance between academic demands and social life.

STM: Struggling with sleep due to late-night coding sessions and social noise.
Feeling the mental strain of college workload and new environment.
MTM: Adjusting to college life, establishing routines amidst chaos.
LTM: Learning to manage stress and maintain health in a new, demanding environment.

short_term.goal: Incorporate yoga or meditation into daily routine

long_term: Achieve a sustainable balance between academic, social, and personal health needs.

STM: Complained about the high cost of coffee in NYC, reflecting financial strain.
MTM: Learning to budget and manage expenses as a new college student.
LTM: Beginning to understand financial independence and exploring basic investments.

short_term.goal: Explore part-time job opportunities or freelance work

long_term: Gain financial stability through smart investments and income diversification.

STM: Reflecting on the authenticity of happiness among peers, feeling an existential crisis.
MTM: Questioning life choices and the purpose of college education.
LTM: Exploring practical perspectives on technology's role in personal and societal growth.

short_term.goal: Read up on existentialism and contemporary philosophy
Attend campus events on technology and society

long_term: Develop a personal philosophy that integrates technology and human values.

STM: No direct mention of $XVI or technology in recent tweets.
MTM: Exploring blockchain and Web3 technologies as part of career growth.
LTM: Integrated $XVI into trading strategies as a case study.
